                      <h1 class="title">
                        <img src="images\PathfinderSocietySymbol.gif" title="PFS Legal" style="margin:3px 3px 0px 3px;"> Armor Proficiency, Medium (Combat)
                      </h1><b>Source</b> <a href="http://paizo.com/pathfinderRPG/v5748btpy88yj" target="_blank" class="external-link">
                        <i>PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 118</i>
                      </a><br />You are skilled at wearing medium armor.<br /><br /><b>Prerequisites</b>: Light Armor Proficiency.<br /><br /><b>Benefit</b>: See Armor Proficiency, Light.<br /><br /><b>Normal</b>: See Armor Proficiency, Light.<br /><br /><b>Special</b>: Barbarians, clerics, druids, fighters, paladins, and rangers automatically have Medium Armor Proficiency as a bonus feat.
